sn48.55:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci saragandha, lohitacandanam tesam aggamakkhayati;
sn48.55:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiya dhamma, pannindriyam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—bodhaya.
sn48.55:1.4: Saddhindriyam, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, tam bodhaya samvattati.
sn48.55:1.8: pannindriyam bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, tam bodhaya samvattati.
sn48.55:1.9: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci saragandha, lohitacandanam tesam aggamakkhayati;
sn48.55:1.10: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiya dhamma, pannindriyam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—bodhaya”ti.
